name: The artist's search
description:
A little game (not sure if it can be called a game p': ) I made for the https://itch.io/jam/blackthornprod-game-jam-1. where everyone had problems finding an artist.

Controls:

- ADWS/Arrows -> move.
- Left click -> Shot at mouse.
- ESC -> Close game.

Credits:

+ Art: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii by https://0x72.itch.io/ ; 0x72)

+ Battle music: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/528165 (by K-Pone)

+ Dungeon music: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/651275 (by bdog705)

+ Code and Design: https://twitter.com/AngelRDev , (https://angelrdev.itch.io/)
